Introduction
This topic contains information about
VA Forms 21-8951
that are subject to automated processing, including
automated processing of certain drill pay cases
preventing the automatic adjustment of a Veteranâ€™s award
, and
hearing requests from Veterans whose drill pay case is subject to automated processing

title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section A - Adjusting Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) Benefits Based on a Veteran's Receipt of Drill Pay
citation: Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section A
